Articles.Content: I never noticed a problem with The Gemini nose cone docking with the half meter docking port..
My comment about the workaround isn't for docking with the half-meter docking port, it's for docking with the Agena docking port. THAT'S the one where the funky collider mesh gives MechJeb fits.
It's not like Gemini docked automatically anyway. And IIRC, neither did Apollo. This was all done by hand by the astronauts.
It has a collar on it that was designed to guide you into it. That with the animated guide bar it is purposely built to help with manual docking.

Yeah, I was really amazed that both the indexing bar and the collar worked as well as they did. You've got a pretty good tolerance on the approach, and doing it manually is actually a whole lot of fun. Doing it with MJ kind of misses the point of using Gemini+Agena in first place.
Will the dennys LRV be included in the final?

Would the props in FASA effect OLDD at all? Because I'm trying to use Denny's Saturn V, but with OLDD installed stock science is disabled. I've deleted everything Apollo related and I just cannot figure this out. Can't get much of a response in Denny's thread so before I pm him.. Is there anything I can do?

Edited May 2, 2014 by Motokid600
not being impatient, any updates?
Working, sometime Monday...

I have a colony on laythe that I am trying to launch kerbals form and the FASA launch tower is a great way to load kerbals, but the tower entrance always loads underground, while normal launch clamps load with their bases on the uneven ground.

Anything I can do to fix this? Thanks!

I have a colony on laythe that I am trying to launch kerbals form and the FASA launch tower is a great way to load kerbals, but the tower entrance always loads underground, while normal launch clamps load with their bases on the uneven ground.

Anything I can do to fix this? Thanks!

Are you using EL? You should probably ask the modder of that mod, since it sounds like it has to deal with EL, and not FASA, because the tower works fine on Kerbin.

Are you using EL? You should probably ask the modder of that mod, since it sounds like it has to deal with EL, and not FASA, because the tower works fine on Kerbin.

Well the stock clamps still load with their bases on the ground so I figured I'd ask here as the FASA parts were the only ones compromised.

Well the stock clamps still load with their bases on the ground so I figured I'd ask here as the FASA parts were the only ones compromised.

Still, post the same question on the EL thread. Fasa towers might not be compatible. Fasa towers, unlike the stock clamps, have a large base that extends a few feet into the ground, where as the stock clamps just have a flat plate they sit on.

Gotcha will do.

Well Done!

Finally get the new ksp fx works on the H-1s 8-)

Edit: the trick to get the smoke works is changing transformName from "smokepoint" to "thrustTransform", because there is no smokepoint defined in the H-1 model.
